caption.title: Representation of the R95p anomaly, which represents extreme precipitation above 95 percentile, for the state of Amazonas, Brazil.
caption.p: The anomaly was calculated considering the percentage difference between the current slice (1961–1990) and the future slice (2041–2070) from a pessimistic emission scenario, the IPCC’s RCP8.5.
Click here for additional data file.
